derivation: and (feminine) תְּבוּנָה; or תּוֹבֻנָה; from H995 (בִּין);
outline:
1. understanding, intelligence
    1. the act of understanding
      1. skill
    2. the faculty of understanding
      1. intelligence, understanding, insight
    3. the object of knowledge
    4. teacher (personification)
strongs_def: intelligence; by implication, an argument; by extension, caprice
